item.description:
At the Last Meetup, we continued development on our Plone site. For a full list of items to be worked on, see the not-officially-launched bostonplone.org website http://www.bostonplon....

At this Meetup, Nate will present his "Multimedia and Podcasting with Plone" lecture. Learn how to build a multimedia content distribution system using Plone. He walk us through the whole process of authoring, uploading and distributing multimedia content using Plone. Publish podcasts, vodcasts, photocasts and screencasts in 3 easy steps.

Directions:
Use the south entrance of the collanade building. The entrance is located at the center of the long building running along the reflecting pool.

The parking is on the intersection of Mass Ave and Huntington and as stated is $15. If you park in the garage:
You should use the Sunday school exit (there are huge painted signs) to exit the garage and walk out on the plaza to the colonnade entrance.

You should tell the security guard that you are here for the Plone User Group.

For more information, see http://www.bostonplon...
item.name: The Boston Plone October Meetup
